Reviews.Title: “Muy bien”
Reviews.Author: David N
Reviews.Content: aunt world traveler recommended hotel mora stayed daughter day layover en route tel york hotel aunt located reasonable price staff courteous helpful hotel block el prado art museum blocks train station highly recommend staying eat food except fresh fruit kosher cafeteria looked nice clean swimming pool night care august 2007 website allows previous

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: marion00
Reviews.Content: hotel received mixed reviews past stayed nights liked recent reviewers location art galleries station clean furnished comfortable found staff helpful friendly air conditioning breakfast hotel fine 250 euros cafe con leche toast croissant hotel value city centre hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: InETn
Reviews.Content: cant beat value location five blocks atocha train station 1 block separate atocha metro madrid fantastic metro street prado read staff desk unfriendly unhelpful werent overly friendly helpful professional read pros cons front hotel decided comfortable fairly size air conditioner shower ive seen toilet leg straddle sit sideways step shower little restaurant bottom nice didnt wander food tons metro time feria de street sort beautiful retiro park botanical gardens bed comfortable clean price internet tricky free note hotel chains people tired paying internet

Reviews.Title: “Great Location for budget travel”
Reviews.Author: Blindbutterfly
Reviews.Content: hotel mora location museo del prado close atocha train station hotel taht greta smell roomand wifi aweful wifi coudl connect

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: yahoodingen
Reviews.Content: stayed friend 4 nights nice perfectly laid didnt balcony window looking onto building heavy traffic front weather crap anyway didnt matter breakfast convenience cheap job options road found location perfect museums close atocha train station 5 minutes close action middle sleep staff friendly bathroom comfortable bed comfortable nice simple hotel price bit lower

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Location and the Room was Good”
Reviews.Author: PaleGale
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel mora september 2011 utilitarian clean comfortable loved central location easily walk prado absolutely worth visit breakfast day little restaurant attached hotel found value money minute walk street easily able walk hotel train station catch train barcelona definitely stay hotel recommend budget traveler

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't recommend!”
Reviews.Author: sseae
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel mora found front desk person male extremely rude acted disgusted arrived bothering offered help restaurant options circled map shoved woman sunday morning rude adequate triple children reaked mildew leaving daughter wall actually wet location cafe ok stay

Reviews.Title: “small, but close to Prado”
Reviews.Author: JoonasH
Reviews.Content: hotel close prado affordable madrid double single person breakfast included clean tv quiet maybe reasonable price compared price level madrid wouldnt recommend friend

Reviews.Title: “Great location for the price”
Reviews.Author: e_moorefield
Reviews.Content: stayed night night madrid returning barcelona flying home hotel easy paseo del prado couple blocks prado museum arrived morning able store bags cabinet lobby sightseeing returned afternoon checked clean reasonably comfortable bathroom easily ive seen outside boat manageable building traffic noise job night id consider staying

Reviews.Title: “I will stay here again”
Reviews.Author: BerneseMtDog
Reviews.Content: hotel mora located middle museums reasonable size free wifi nice downstairs coffee shop restaurant furnishings staff friendly helpful didnt miniature shower standard european shower ac fine temperate period leave window night noise moderate city totally quiet 70 euros including tax

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant; no problems”
Reviews.Author: newyawka2001
Reviews.Content: stayed 10 days pay advance negatives getting bill paying street bit quiet vibrant blocks staff extremely nice home worth combining research sightseeing

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location for Museums”
Reviews.Author: rms11
Reviews.Content: budget hotel clean adequate quick night stay prado sophia art exhibits internet except wifi lobby laptop tv limited 7 spanish speaking stations 407 rear hotel quiet sounds travel paper thin walls doors hotel restaurant site walk atocha train station retiro park
